pageProduct.name: Swisse Curcumin Turmeric 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Curcumin is a premium quality formula to help relieve symptoms of mild osteoarthritis and support joint health.

Mild Osteoarthritis Symptom Relief: Curcumin helps relieve symptoms of mild osteoarthritis of the knee such as mild joint pain and inflammation.

Joint Health & Mobility: Curcumin supports joint health, mobility and flexibility.

Antioxidant: Curcumin provides antioxidants that help reduce free radical damage to body cells.

Swisse Ultiboost Curcumin has been formulated to support joint health in a convenient, one-a-day dose.

Lifestyle Claim: Vegetarian

Size: 60 Tablets

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

No added lactose, gluten, yeast, egg, soy or artificial flavours. Suitable for vegetarians.

Ingredients

Each tablet contains:

CurcuWIN™ (proprietary blend) (equiv. curcumin 60 mg) 250 mg

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
One tablet daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C. Do not use if cap seal is broken
